xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 30 May 2014
xwikidoc.content: <mcupak> has quit 10:15 <akats> has joined #phenotips 11:19 <sdumitriu> has quit 11:23 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 11:34 <akats> has quit 11:54 <akats> has joined #phenotips 11:55 <mcupak> has quit 11:55 <vijay13> has quit 11:58 <vijay13> has quit 12:35 <akats> has quit 12:52 <akats> has joined #phenotips 18:03 <akats> sdumitriu: Could you email me the pass for phenotips~~~~~~~~~sandbox, if I may have it. I don't have the private key on my computer at home, so I can't log without a password. 18:04 <sdumitriu> What sandbox? 18:04 <sdumitriu> The p3 server? 18:04 <akats> yes 18:04 <sdumitriu> I don't know the password, get another key locally and send me the public part 18:05 <akats> ok. one sec 18:12 <akats> I've sent you a key. Though the header is not ssh-rsa, but ssh-dss 18:13 <akats> I don't know if that matters 18:14 <sdumitriu> ssh-keygen -t rsa 18:14 <akats> ok 18:17 <akats> sent. Thank you. 18:18 <sdumitriu> Try now 18:21 <akats> Didn't work, but I think it's on my end. Let me try something. 18:21 <sdumitriu> Remove the dsa keys 18:24 <akats> that might not be it, because I tried with -i 18:24 <akats> I'm going to add my key to the authorized on combine 18:24 <akats> maybe thats it 18:24 <sdumitriu> Yes 18:24 <sdumitriu> Or... I wonder if you need the ssh-agent running 18:25 <sdumitriu> Yes, I think so, since you're using -A 18:26 <akats> ok I'll try 18:29 <akats> is there a specific argument I should run ssh-agent with? 18:30 <sdumitriu> What Linux do you have? 18:30 <akats> manjaro, so arch 18:30 <sdumitriu> Usually there's a specific way of starting the agent 18:30 <sdumitriu> Is that KDE? 18:31 <akats> oh and here I naively thought that I could just ssh-agent. It's lxfc 18:31 <akats> wait no 18:31 <sdumitriu> Or XFCE? 18:31 <akats> XFCE 18:31 <akats> I always confuse them 18:32 <sdumitriu> http://superuser.com/questions/52562/ssh-keychain-for-xfce 18:32 <sdumitriu> http://hnygard.no/ubuntu/setup-of-ssh-agent-in-xubuntu-11-10-to-get-password-less-authentication-with-use-of-public-key/ 18:33 <sdumitriu> https://confluence.clazzes.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=6848556 18:33 <akats> Thank you 18:36 <akats> Got it 18:36 <akats> ssh-add was the trick 19:04 <akats> I finished installing it, but I have not tested it. Just looked at whether or not the UI is showing up. I'll test it tomorrow. 19:04 <sdumitriu1> Good 19:04 <akats> Is there anything you want me to do, or should I just continue working on the spreadsheet export? 19:31 <akats> has left #phenotips
